sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>Maintaining and updating maintenance concepts, tasks and criteria for all levels of maintenance during the equipment/system life cycle. Maintaining documentation (repair standards, drawings, specifications, test procedures, PMS, ILS, APLs, COSAL, etc.) for technical accuracy and adequacy. Maintaining and updating maintenance inspection criteria and procedures for repair and overhaul of systems and equipment. Assisting in design reviews. Evaluating and validating maintenance actions and their frequency including Planned Maintenance System (PMS) and Technical Feedback Reports (TFBRs). Also includes the cost of providing and administering warranty management support.</definition> <number>GWBS0001448</number> <parent_task display_value="4.7 In Service Engineering Activity (ISEA)">2b158176db91a3008e9357935e9619a6</parent_task> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>23158176db91a3008e9357935e9619a9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 16:54:56</sys_updated_on> <task_code>4.7.4</task_code> <task_name>4.7.4 Maintenance Engineering Support</task_name> <task_title>Maintenance Engineering Support</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
